QEWDToken.description: For accessing the API a valid token must be passed in all the queries in the 'Cookies' header.  A valid token is generated by the /api/initialise API.  The following syntax must be used in the 'Cookie' header :    JSESSIONID=xxxxxxx
QEWDToken.name: Authorization

200.description: The users session token and mode

400.description: Delivers new user session token to browser and signals it to reload
